channel.title: Comments on: SQL Server DBA Tip 15 – SQL Server Agent – Job ownership
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: David Forck (thirster42)
item.dc:creator: David Forck (thirster42)
item.content:encoded:
it’s also important to note that if a job have a user as an owner, and that user leaves and the account is disabled, the job will fail (or at least should fail).

i went through this little nugget of joy when our dba left.
